Pre-Game Insights: Switzerland are favoured to come out on top in this match at 5/4 due to their squad and recent form against Hungary.
Switzerland have won six of their last nine games against Hungary, not losing to Hungary since 1998.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is only the second time these two nations are meeting in the finals of a major tournament.
Hungary won 2-0 against Switzerland in the World Cup in 1938.
The Swiss have gone unbeaten in their last four games, drawing twice and winning another two.
Granit Xhaka is a key part to Switzerland's midfield and should play a leading role in this tournament.
Others: Hungary vs Switzerland is taking place on Saturday, 15th June 2024, at 2pm at the RheinEnergieStadion in Cologne, Germany.
The match will be broadcast on ITV.
The odds for the match are Hungary 23/10, Draw 9/4, and Switzerland 5/4.
